poem:
Title: The Relentless Siege

Wounded shark, Boohoo submerged in fiscal abyss,
A thousand souls jettisoned into ceaseless limbo,
Losses soaring like black-bellied buzzards in the mist.
Under the aberrant shadow of Shein,
In the echoed clamour of high streets awakened.
Debenhams fortress, and her sisters scrimping strength,
Yet the debt, it burgeons, throbbing, pulsating,
In the cold heart of commerce.
